metadata.name: YAWA'SHOGI VOL 1
metadata.description:
"Yawashogi" is a collaborative animation piece created by Slumgods.eth and Bitjamin Franklin. These talented artists combined their skills and visions to bring this piece to life, using AI technology to create a truly immersive and authentic experience. The result is a beautifully crafted animation that tells the story of a slum god's resilience and strength as they navigate life in the slums.

The music for "Yawashogi" was also a collaborative effort, with Oluwa of Slum Gods contributing their talent to the piece. Together, Slumgods.eth, Bitjamin Franklin, and Oluwa have created a truly unique and powerful animation that is sure to captivate and inspire anyone who watches it. Whether you are a fan of anime or simply enjoy immersive storytelling, "Yawashogi" is a must-see piece that showcases the talent and creativity of its creators.
